# HUD::SET_TEXT_RIGHT_JUSTIFY

## Summary
Right justifies the text

## Parameters
* **BOOL** textRightJustifyFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
It also moves the origin of the text to the right hand side of the text.
